sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Enterprise_ReferenceMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'EnterpriseRefPostalCodeLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'EnterpriseRefPostalCodeLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT 
POSTAL_CODE_MASTER_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
POSTAL_CODE,
STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE,
CITY_NAME,
IS_PREFERRED_CITY_NAME,
CITY_ABBREVIATION,
COUNTRY_CODE,
MSA_CODE as F_MSA_ID,
TIME_ZONE,
OBSERVES_DST,
LATITUDE,
LONGITUDE,
POSTAL_CODE_TYPE,
FIPS_CODE,
ZONE_NAME,
B_DELETETYPE,
B_DELETEDATE,
B_DELETEAUTHOR,
B_DELETEOPERATION,
active_flag
FROM
[Ref_PostalCode].[vw_PostalCode_IUD]

DELETE FROM [Ref_PostalCode].[ZipInfo_USz5max];
SELECT 1 as success;

DELETE FROM [Ref_PostalCode].[GeocoderCA_PCensusNWE];
SELECT 1 as success;

SELECT 
POSTAL_CODE_MASTER_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
POSTAL_CODE,
STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE,
CITY_NAME,
IS_PREFERRED_CITY_NAME,
CITY_ABBREVIATION,
COUNTRY_CODE,
MSA_CODE,
TIME_ZONE,
OBSERVES_DST,
LATITUDE,
LONGITUDE,
POSTAL_CODE_TYPE,
FIPS_CODE,
ZONE_NAME,
B_DELETETYPE,
B_DELETEDATE,
B_DELETEAUTHOR,
B_DELETEOPERATION,
active_flag
FROM
[Ref_PostalCode].[vw_PostalCode_IUD]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT DISTINCT 
          LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
          LIC_CONTACT, 
          COMPANY_CODE,
		  GetDate() as LOAD_DATE
FROM DBO.GD_LEGAL_ENTITY WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
'SiteAdditionalInformation' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
id AS SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,
opr_tuesday_start_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_wednesday_start_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_wednesday_end_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_thursday_start_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_START_TIME,
opr_thursday_end_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_END_TIME,
opr_friday_start_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_START_TIME,
opr_friday_end_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_END_TIME,
opr_saturday_start_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_START_TIME,
opr_saturday_end_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_END_TIME,
opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME
FROM Retail.v_site_additional_info_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT
'SiteAdditionalInformation' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
id AS SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,
opr_tuesday_start_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_wednesday_start_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_wednesday_end_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_thursday_start_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_START_TIME,
opr_thursday_end_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_END_TIME,
opr_friday_start_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_START_TIME,
opr_friday_end_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_END_TIME,
opr_saturday_start_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_START_TIME,
opr_saturday_end_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_END_TIME,
opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME
FROM Retail.v_site_additional_info_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
google_id AS F_GOOGLE_ID,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CASE WHEN warehouse_account_ship_to IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE 'INITIALLOAD' END as FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
warehouse_account_ship_to AS FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE
FROM Retail.v_site_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM Retail.v_legal_entity_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

activities.name: IncrementalSiteView
activities.description: select all data from DACJSONLoadSite view

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  B_PUBID
      ,B_SOURCEID
      ,DAC_ACCOUNT_ID
      ,DAC_LOCATION_ID
      ,SITE_NAME
      ,SITE_TYPE as Type
      ,RAW_PHONE
      ,RAW_FAX
      ,LAND_LINE
      ,OPERATIONAL_STATUS
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
      ,STORE_LOCATOR_DISABLED
      ,Location_Number
      ,B_ClassName
      ,B_DELETETYPE
      ,B_DELETEDATE
      ,B_DELETEAUTHOR
      ,B_DELETEOPERATION
  FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSite_INC_Activity_V
  Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
LocationNumber AS SITE_CONTENT_ID
,'SiteContent' AS B_CLASSNAME
,[LocationNumber]
,[ExteriorPhoto]
,[FlyerLink]
,[Promotion1Image]  
      ,[Promotion1URL]
      ,[Promotion2URL]
      ,[Promotion2Image]
      ,[ScheduleApptURL]
      ,[AlternateWebsiteURL]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),WebsiteURL) as WebsiteURL
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessDescription]) as BusinessDescription
      ,[BusinessLongDescription]
      ,convert(nvarchar(128),BusinessShortDescription) as BusinessShortDescription
	  ,convert(nvarchar(128),[BusinessName]) as BusinessName
      ,[ContentLanguage]
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
      ,FS_SITE_ID
      ,B_DELETETYPE
      ,B_DELETEDATE
      ,B_DELETEAUTHOR
      ,B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent_INC]

SELECT 
      B_CLASSNAME
      ,SITE_HOURS_TYPE
      ,DAY_OF_WEEK
      
	  ,CASE
    WHEN Cast (START_TIME as nvarchar(10)) = 'Closed' Then ''
	Else Cast (START_TIME as nvarchar(10)) end as Starttm
	,CASE
    WHEN Cast (END_TIME as nvarchar(10))='' Then ''
	Else Cast (END_TIME as nvarchar(10)) end as endtm

      ,FP_SITE
      ,FS_SITE
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
	,SiteDefaultHours as Key1
      ,BUSINESS_STATE
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours_INC]

SELECT  B_PUBID
      ,B_SOURCEID
      ,AccountID
      ,FS_SITE_ID
      ,F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID
      ,SITE_NAME
      ,SITE_TYPE
      ,OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1
      ,ADDRESS_LINE2
      ,SITE_RAW_CITY
      ,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE
      ,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE
      ,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE
      ,SITE_RAW_LATITUDE
      ,SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE
      ,B_CREDATE
      ,B_CREATOR
      ,B_UPDATOR
      ,FP_SITE_ID
      ,B_CLASSNAME
       ,B_DELETETYPE
      ,B_DELETEDATE
      ,B_DELETEAUTHOR
      ,B_DELETEOPERATION
  FROM Retail.DACIncrementalOPCTracking_INC_Activity_V
  Where Activity_Type in('Insert','update')

SELECT 
    'SiteSpecialHour' AS B_CLASSNAME,
    SPH_Date,
    SPH_StartTime,
    SPH_Endtime,
    SPH_State,
    FP_SITE,
    FS_SITE,
    B_CREDATE,
    B_CREATOR,
    B_UPDATOR,
    SiteSpecialHours AS key1
FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours_INC

SELECT [B_PUBID]
      ,[B_SOURCEID]
      ,[DAC_ACCOUNT_ID]
      ,[DAC_LOCATION_ID]
      ,[Location_Number]
      ,[STORE_LOCATOR_DISABLED]
      ,[RAW_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_FAX]
      ,[LAND_LINE]
      ,[OPERATIONAL_STATUS]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,SITE_TYPE
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[FP_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_ClassName]
      ,[IsActiveType]  
      ,B_DELETETYPE
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
  FROM Retail.DACIncrementalSite_INC_Activity_V
  Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

SELECT [LocationNumber]
      ,[ExteriorPhoto]
      ,[FlyerLink]
      ,[Promotion1Image]
      ,[Promotion1URL]
      ,[Promotion2URL]
      ,[Promotion2Image]
      ,[ScheduleApptURL]
      ,[AlternateWebsiteURL]
      ,[WebsiteURL]
      ,[BusinessDescription]
      ,[BusinessLongDescription]
      ,[BusinessShortDescription]
      ,[BusinessName]
      ,[ContentLanguage]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[FP_SITE_ID]
      ,[FS_SITE_ID]
      ,[IsActiveType]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,ReActive_Flag
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent_INC]

SELECT [B_PUBID]
      ,[B_SOURCEID]
      ,[AccountID]
      ,[LocationID]
      ,[F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2]
      ,[SITE_RAW_CITY]
      ,[SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_LATITUDE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[FP_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_CLASSNAME]
      ,[FS_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,[IsActiveType]
  FROM Retail.DACIncrementalOPCTracking_INC_Activity_V
  Where Activity_Type in('Insert','update')

SELECT [B_CLASSNAME]
      ,[SITE_HOURS_TYPE]
      ,[DAY_OF_WEEK]
      ,[START_TIME]
      ,[END_TIME]
      ,[FP_SITE]
      ,[FS_SITE]
      ,[Location_ID]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[BUSINESS_STATE]
      ,SiteDefaultHours
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,[IsActiveType]
      ,ReActive_Flag
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours_INC]

SELECT [FS_SITE]
      ,[SPH_Date]
      ,[SPH_StartTime]
      ,[SPH_Endtime]
      ,[SPH_State]
      ,[FP_SITE]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[LocationID]
      ,SiteSpecialHours
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[IsActiveType]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,ReActive_Flag
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours_INC]

SELECT [B_PUBID]
      ,[B_SOURCEID]
      ,[DAC_ACCOUNT_ID]
      ,[DAC_LOCATION_ID]
      ,[Location_Number]
      ,[STORE_LOCATOR_DISABLED]
      ,[RAW_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_FAX]
      ,[LAND_LINE]
      ,[OPERATIONAL_STATUS]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[FP_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_ClassName]
      ,[IsActiveType]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,ReActive_Flag
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSite_INC]

SELECT [B_PUBID]
      ,[B_SOURCEID]
      ,[AccountID]
      ,[LocationID]
      ,[F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2]
      ,[SITE_RAW_CITY]
      ,[SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_LATITUDE]
      ,[SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE]
      ,[B_CREDATE]
      ,[B_CREATOR]
      ,[B_UPDATOR]
      ,[FP_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_CLASSNAME]
      ,[FS_SITE_ID]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,[IsActiveType]
      ,ReActive_Flag
  FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalOPCTracking_INC]

SELECT
    CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(Location_Number) > 0 THEN 'true'
    ELSE 'false'
  END AS rtn_value
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSite] s
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON s.Location_Number = sm.GoogleID
WHERE sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'
  AND sm.GoogleID IN (
      SELECT Location_Number
      FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSite_His]
      WHERE B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' and  ReActive_Flag='1'
  )

UPDATE h
SET  h.ReActive_Flag='0'
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSite_His] h
JOIN [Retail].[DACIncrementalSite] s ON h.Location_Number = s.Location_Number
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON s.Location_Number = sm.GoogleID
WHERE h.B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE'
  AND sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'

 select 1;

SELECT
    CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(s.B_SOURCEID) > 0 THEN 'true'
    ELSE 'false'
  END AS rtn_value
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalOPCTracking] s
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.B_SOURCEID, CHARINDEX('-',s.B_SOURCEID) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'
  AND sm.GoogleID IN (
      SELECT LEFT(B_SOURCEID, CHARINDEX('-', B_SOURCEID) - 1)
      FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalOPCTracking_His]
      WHERE B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' and  ReActive_Flag='1'
  )

UPDATE h
SET  h.ReActive_Flag='0'
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalOPCTracking_His] h
JOIN [Retail].[DACIncrementalOPCTracking] s ON h.B_SOURCEID = s.B_SOURCEID
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.B_SOURCEID, CHARINDEX('-',s.B_SOURCEID) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE h.B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE'
  AND sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'

 select 1;

SELECT
    CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(s.FS_SITE_ID) > 0 THEN 'true'
    ELSE 'false'
  END AS rtn_value
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent] s
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.FS_SITE_ID, CHARINDEX('-', s.FS_SITE_ID) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'
  AND sm.GoogleID IN (
      SELECT LEFT(FS_SITE_ID, CHARINDEX('-', FS_SITE_ID) - 1)
      FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent_His]
      WHERE B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' and  ReActive_Flag='1'
  )

UPDATE h
SET  h.ReActive_Flag='0'
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent_His] h
JOIN [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteContent] s ON h.FS_SITE_ID = 
s.FS_SITE_ID
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(h.FS_SITE_ID, CHARINDEX('-', h.FS_SITE_ID) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE h.B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' AND sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'

 select 1;

UPDATE h
SET  h.ReActive_Flag='0'
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours_His] h
JOIN [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours] s ON h.FS_SITE = s.FS_SITE
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-',s.FS_SITE) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE h.B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE'
  AND sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'

 select 1;

SELECT
    CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(s.FS_SITE) > 0 THEN 'true'
    ELSE 'false'
  END AS rtn_value
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours] s
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-',s.FS_SITE) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'
  AND sm.GoogleID IN (
      SELECT LEFT(FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-', FS_SITE) - 1)
      FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteDefaultHours_His]
      WHERE B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' and  ReActive_Flag='1'
  )

SELECT
    CASE 
    WHEN COUNT(s.FS_SITE) > 0 THEN 'true'
    ELSE 'false'
  END AS rtn_value
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours] s
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-',s.FS_SITE) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'
  AND sm.GoogleID IN (
      SELECT LEFT(FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-', FS_SITE) - 1)
      FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours_His]
      WHERE B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE' and  ReActive_Flag='1'
  )

UPDATE h
SET  h.ReActive_Flag='0'
FROM [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours_His] h
JOIN [Retail].[DACIncrementalSiteSpecialHours] s ON h.FS_SITE = s.FS_SITE
JOIN smartsheet.storemastercustom sm ON LEFT(s.FS_SITE, CHARINDEX('-',s.FS_SITE) - 1) = sm.GoogleID
WHERE h.B_DELETETYPE = 'SOFT_DELETE'
  AND sm.Status LIKE 'Active%'

 select 1;

activities.name: IncrementalSAStoris_Intgeration
activities.description: select all data from SA_Storis_Intgeration view

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select 
B_sourceid
,B_PUBID
,'Site' as B_CLASSNAME
,UnitNumber as Unit_Number
,LocationName 
,RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUMBER
,StoreType as Type
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
FROM [RsmSiteSubscriber].[site_source_Incremental_activity_V]
Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

activities.name: Storis_Integration_His
activities.description: select all data from ZipAllocation_INC_V view

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
 B_sourceid
,B_PUBID
,UnitNumber
,LocationName
,RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUMBER
,StoreType
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,Activity_Type
,IsActiveType
FROM [RsmSiteSubscriber].[site_source_Incremental_activity_V]
Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

SELECT  
Address1 as SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1
,State as SITE_RAW_STATE
,City as SITE_RAW_CITY
,PostalCodeID as SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE
,StoreID as PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER
,Operation_ID
,SITE_NAME
,B_PUBID
,B_SourceID
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,B_SourceID as FS_SITE_ID  
,B_PubID as FP_SITE_ID
,'HomeStoreOperationProfitCenterTracking' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM RsmSiteSubscriber.Opc_Tracker_Incremental_activity_V
Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

SELECT
 Address1
,State
,City
,PostalCodeID
,StoreID
,Operation_ID
,B_PUBID
,B_SourceID
,SITE_NAME
,B_DELETETYPE
,B_DELETEDATE
,B_DELETEAUTHOR
,B_DELETEOPERATION
,Activity_Type
,IsActiveType
FROM RsmSiteSubscriber.Opc_Tracker_Incremental_activity_V
Where Activity_Type in('Insert','Update')

SELECT [B_sourceid]
      ,[B_PUBID]
      ,[UnitNumber]
      ,[LocationName]
      ,[RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUMBER]
      ,[StoreType]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,[IsActiveType]
  FROM [RsmSiteSubscriber].[site_source_Incremental]

SELECT [Address1]
      ,[State]
      ,[City]
      ,[PostalCodeID]
      ,[StoreID]
      ,[Operation_ID]
      ,[B_PUBID]
      ,[B_Sourceid]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[B_DELETETYPE]
      ,[B_DELETEDATE]
      ,[B_DELETEAUTHOR]
      ,[B_DELETEOPERATION]
      ,[Activity_Type]
      ,[IsActiveType]
  FROM [RsmSiteSubscriber].[Opc_Tracker_Incremental]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT 
'Site' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
site_id AS B_SOURCEID,
operational_status AS OPERATIONAL_STATUS,
type AS TYPE,
account_num AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
ship_to_num AS SHIP_TO_NUM,
model AS MODEL,
version AS VERSION,
time_zone AS TIME_ZONE,
local_currency_code  AS LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
raw_phone AS RAW_PHONE,
raw_cs_phone AS RAW_CS_PHONE,
raw_fax AS RAW_FAX,
sms_code AS SMS_CODE,
soft_open_date AS SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
grand_open_date AS GRAND_OPEN_DATE,
close_date AS CLOSE_DATE,
area_unit_of_measure AS AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
building_sqft AS BUILDING_SQFT,
warehouse_sqft AS WAREHOUSE_SQFT,
showroom_sqft AS SHOWROOM_SQFT,
office_sqft AS OFFICE_SQFT,
num_of_dock_doors AS NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
retail_system_num AS RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, 
enterprise_store_num AS ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM,
prospect_id  AS PROSPECT_ID,
CAST(dma_id AS DECIMAL(17,0)) AS DMA_ID, 
dma AS DMA,
msa_id AS MSA_ID,
msa AS MSA,
market AS MARKET,
region AS REGION,
domestic_category AS DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
country_category AS COUNTRY_CATEGORY,
CAST(ecom_fulfiller_flag AS BIT) AS ECOM_FULFILLER_FLAG
FROM Retail.v_site_warehouse_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM Retail.v_wh_legal_entity_incremental WITH(NOLOCK)
